exceptions.exn: Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

original: intros Hle HRInt Hpos. apply norm_ge_0. apply norm_RInt_le_const with (f0 := fun x => scal (sign (b - a)) (f x)) (M := 0). - apply Hle. - intros x Hx. simpl. apply Rmult_le_compat_l. + apply norm_ge_0. + apply Hpos. destruct Hx as [Hx1 Hx2]. split; apply Rlt_Rminus; auto. - eapply is_RInt_ext. + intros x Hx. unfold scal. unfold sign. destruct (Rlt_dec (b - a) 0). * intro. apply False_ind. apply Rlt_irrefl with 0. apply Rplus_lt_0_compat with (r1 := -1) (r2 := 1). { apply Rlt_minus. apply Ropp_0_gt_lt_contravar. apply H. } { apply Rlt_minus. right. apply Rplus_eq_compat; reflexivity. } * reflexivity. + apply HRInt.
